  • Uses of ResourceResolver in au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.execution

    Classes in au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.execution that implement ResourceResolver
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BaseResourceResolver
    Base implementation of the ResourceResolver interface that provides common functionality for resolving FHIR resources during FHIRPath evaluation.
    class 
    DefaultResourceResolver
    A specialized implementation of ResourceResolver that works with definition-based resources rather than FHIR resources from a data source.
    class 
    SingleResourceResolver
    A simple implementation of BaseResourceResolver that provides access to a single FHIR resource type.
    Methods in au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.execution with parameters of type ResourceResolver

    Method
    Description
    static FhirpathEvaluator.FhirpathEvaluatorBuilder
    FhirpathEvaluator.fromResolver(ResourceResolver resourceResolver)
    Creates a builder initialized with the specified resource resolver.
